content.text:
Here is the output, wrapped in the specified tags:

Providing Excellent Customer Service as a Customer Service Representative

1. Communicate with customers by phone, email, chat, or in-person to provide information about the company's products and services 2. Handle customer inquiries, provide answers to questions, and help resolve any issues or concerns 3. Process orders, modifications, and cancellations as needed 4. Obtain details of customer complaints and work to find appropriate resolutions, escalating to a manager when necessary 5. Document all customer interactions and transactions in the CRM system 6. Identify opportunities to upsell products or services that may benefit the customer 7. Stay up-to-date on product information, service changes, and company policies to provide accurate information 8. Maintain a positive, empathetic, and professional attitude toward customers at all times
